repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Teachers Union of the City of New York Executive Board Minutes on Microfilm
did.abstract: This collection is the guide for meeting minutes of the Executive Board of the Teachers Union of the City of New York, 1929-1941, 1944-1963.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection is the guide for meeting minutes of the Executive Board of the Teachers Union of the City of New York, 1929-1941, 1944-1963.
A negative copy is available upon request. A negative copy of the Records Guide is also available upon request.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Teachers Union of the City of New York Executive Board Minutes on Microfilm #5015 mf. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5015: Teachers Union of the City of New York Records 5015 MB: Teachers Union of the City of New York SCMWA Local 555 Anne Grant Pin Memorabilia 5015 AV: Teachers Union of the City of New York Audio-Visual Materials 5018: US Congressional Investigation of Teachers' Union Local No. 555, United Public Workers of America, CIO 5019: AFT Executive Council Transcript of Hearing of Local 5 5020: AFT Executive Council Transcript of Hearing of Local 537 5445: Teachers Union of the City of New York Records 5470: Papers regarding Abraham Feingold's Prosecution For Alleged Communist Sympathies 5927: Teachers Union of the City of New York Additional Records 6046: Archives Union File (AUF)
